text: @CNN Wishing them a speedy & complete recovery. Didn’t I read somewhere that nobody will be responsible for their covid-19 ins Bill? Something very wrong w/ this picture if this is allowed on a frontline worker. I can’t imagine what’s happening to the rest of sick people.
